name: Basil Pesto Salmon Parmesan
author: Mr. Saxton
summary: Salmon with Smokehouse pepper, pesto smear, and a Parmesan crust. Serve with fresh-cooked green beans, asparagus, red wine, garlic bread, and Greek salad.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds salmon fillets with skin on
1 teaspoon ground smoked black pepper (such as McCormick® Smokehouse)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Pull out any salmon bones with pliers
Place salmon skin side-down on a sheet of aluminum foil
Transfer to a large baking pan
Season salmon with salt and pepper; loosely cover with foil
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes
Remove baking pan from oven and uncover
Smear pesto over each portion of salmon
Continue baking, uncovered, until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes
Whisk butter and lemon juice together in a small bowl
